thread.title: Israel shoots down heavy Gaza mortar fire

title: Israel shoots down heavy Gaza mortar fire
text:
Israel shoots down heavy Gaza mortar fire 12:14pm BST - 01:20
Israel's Iron Dome anti-missile shield shot down a barrage of mortar shells fired from the Gaza Strip on Tuesday after sirens sounded in southern Israel, warning residents to find shelter. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Israel's Iron Dome anti-missile shield shot down a barrage of mortar shells fired from the Gaza Strip on Tuesday after sirens sounded in southern Israel, warning residents to find shelter.
